trans-unit.source: Provides methods and properties for all glyph classes that an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> displays when it is selected on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos e propriedades para glifo todas as classes que um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> exibe quando ele é selecionado na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Some glyphs that are displayed on an activity designer can be selected by the user while others cannot.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Alguns glifos que são exibidos em um designer de atividade podem ser selecionados pelo usuário, enquanto outros não.

trans-unit.source: When a user selects a glyph that can be selected, the glyph changes appearance on the activity design surface.
trans-unit.target: Quando um usuário seleciona um glifo que pode ser selecionado, o glifo altera aparência na superfície de design de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The SelectionGlyph class is the base class for all glyph classes that change appearance when a user selects it on the activity design surface.
trans-unit.target: A classe SelectionGlyph é a classe base para todas as classes de glifo que alteram a aparência quando um usuário seleciona-o na superfície de design de atividade.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SelectionGlyph"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada em uma classe derivada, inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SelectionGlyph"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounds for the selection glyph on the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna os limites para o símbolo de seleção especificado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, GetBounds returns a rectangle one-and-one-half times the size of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Bounds%2A> of `designer`.
trans-unit.target: A menos que substituída em uma classe derivada, GetBounds retorna um retângulo um-e-meia o tamanho do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Bounds%2A>de `designer`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> with which the selection glyph is associated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> à qual o símbolo de seleção está associado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate whether the selection glyph appears on the activity designer surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar se o símbolo de seleção aparece na superfície do designer de atividade; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds for the glyph.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa os limites do glifo.

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of rectangles that represents the selected glyph's grab handles.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma matriz de retângulos que representa o glifo selecionado pegar alças.

trans-unit.source: Grab handles are the small boxes on the edge of a selected glyph that a user can grab and move to drag or resize the glyph.
trans-unit.target: Identificadores de captura são as caixas pequenas na borda de um glifo selecionado que um usuário possa capturar e mover para arraste ou redimensione o glifo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> with which the selection glyph is associated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> à qual o símbolo de seleção está associado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> array of the grab handles to display on the selected glyph.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> matriz de captura manipula para exibir no glifo selecionado.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the selection glyph is the primary of all selected glyphs on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém um valor que indica se o símbolo de seleção é o principal de todos os glifos selecionados na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the selection glyph is the primary selected glyph on the activity designer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o símbolo de seleção é o principal glifo selecionado no designer de atividade; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Performs any tasks required to render the glyph on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Executa as tarefas necessárias para renderizar o glifo na superfície do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: OnPaint draws all elements of the glyph that the user selects, including the glyphs grab handles.
trans-unit.target: OnPaint desenha todos os elementos do glifo selecionado pelo usuário, incluindo as glifos captura alças.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to perform fill and drawing tasks.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> para executar tarefas de desenho e preenchimento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the glyph appears on the design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que o símbolo aparece na superfície de design; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> to use to access ambient property settings.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"> </xref> para usar para acessar configurações de propriedade de ambiente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> from which to obtain information about user actions.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> do qual obter informações sobre ações do usuário.

trans-unit.source: Gets the view priority of the glyph on the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a prioridade de exibição do glifo no designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The possible priority settings are defined by the following <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph> fields: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.HighestPriority>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.LowestPriority>, and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.NormalPriority>.
trans-unit.target: As configurações de prioridade possíveis são definidas pela seguinte <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph>campos: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.HighestPriority>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.LowestPriority>e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.NormalPriority>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.NormalPriority> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.LowestPriority> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.HighestPriority> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph>

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the view priority of the glyph on the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa a prioridade de exibição do glifo no designer de atividade.
